clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of DBPR108 and Metformin Hydrochloride Combination Therapy in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel Controlled Phase III Clinical Trial of DBRP108 in Combination With Metformin Hydrochloride in the Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to evaluate the efficacy and safety of DBPR108 tablets in combination with metformin hydrochloride in the treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus. A total of 210 subjects will be randomly assigned in a ratio of 2:1 to receive metformin hydrochloride plus DBPR108 or metformin hydrochloride plus placebo.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in HbA1c (%) from baseline to week 24
primary_outcome.description: The change of HbA1c from baseline to 24 weeks compared with metformin hydrochloride + placebo

secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients achieving HbA1c ≤ 6.5% at week 24
Proportion of patients achieving HbA1c ≤ 7% at week 24

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in HbA1c (%) from baseline to week 12
secondary_outcome.description: The change of HbA1c from baseline to 12 weeks compared with metformin hydrochloride + placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in fasting plasma glucose (FPG) from baseline to week 12 and week 24
secondary_outcome.description: The change in FPG from baseline to week 12 and week 24 compared with metformin hydrochloride + placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in 2h-postprandial plasma glucose (2h-PPG) from baseline to week 12 and week 24
secondary_outcome.description: The change in 2h-PPG from baseline to week 12 and week 24 compared with metformin hydrochloride + placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in body weight from baseline to week 12 and week 24
secondary_outcome.description: The change in body weight from baseline to week 12 and week 24 compared with metformin hydrochloride +placebo

intervention.description: DBPR108: 100 mg, once daily for 24 weeks.
metformin hydrochloride: 500 mg, 1-3 times daily for 24 weeks.
placebo:100 mg, once daily for 24 weeks.
